sentences.english: It is banned to sell illegally fished fishing gains in the prohibited fishing areas or within the prohibited fishing periods.
sentences.chinese: 在禁漁區或者禁漁期內禁止銷售非法捕撈的漁獲物。

sentences.english: It is banned to sell illegally fished fishing gains in the prohibited fishing areas or within the prohibited fishing periods.
sentences.chinese: 在禁漁區或者禁漁期內禁止銷售非法捕撈的漁獲物。

sentences.english: The sale of catch illegally harvested in the restricted fishing areas and during closed seasons is prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 在禁漁區或者禁漁期內禁止銷售非法捕撈的漁獲物。

sentences.english: The sale of catch illegally harvested in the restricted fishing areas and during closed seasons is prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 在禁漁區或者禁漁期內禁止銷售非法捕撈的漁獲物。

sentences.english: It is prohibited to sell illegally fished fishing gains in the banned fishing areas or within the banned fishing periods.
sentences.chinese: 在禁漁區或者禁漁期內禁止銷售非法捕撈的漁獲物。

sentences.english: It is prohibited to sell illegally fished fishing gains in the banned fishing areas or within the banned fishing periods.
sentences.chinese: 在禁漁區或者禁漁期內禁止銷售非法捕撈的漁獲物。

sentences.english: Fishing is now banned for two months of the year to allow marine life a chance to breed.
sentences.chinese: 每年禁漁兩月，以給予海洋生物休養生息的機會。

sentences.english: The closures stimulated a boom in shrimp and red snapper later.
sentences.chinese: 禁漁刺激了對蝦需求量的增長，接着到紅鯛魚。
